full_text: When you see that @therapy_cinema pointed out how "Severus Snape's hair getting more fluffy and attractive is a deliberate sign that his arc is heroic", and Reylo/Ben Solo fans have been saying this since 2015 about Kylo Ren's fluffy hair in "Star Wars: The Force Awakens". https://t.co/oxLergM8F0
